title: Invaders From Mars (1986)
description:
In this remake of the classic 50s SF tale, a boy tries to stop an invasion of his town by aliens who take over the the minds of his parents, his least-liked schoolteacher and other townspeople. With the aid of the school nurse the boy enlists the aid of the U.S. Marines.


Earlier I posted the original version of the movie. Here is the newer 1986 example.

Hopefully it will give you the chance to see which you prefer.

Personally I like the older. But the special effects are far better in the newer version.
